nodes.text: This male human was the older brother of Torben. Torben fought and was killed by his brother when a group of Scyre led by Keldo caught up with Phasma, Torben, and Siv, who were helping General Brendol Hux get back to his ship after crash landing on the planet Parnassos. Torben's brother was killed when Siv shot him with a stormtrooper's blaster. As he fell to the ground, Siv saw a small smile lit his face and she thought she saw his lips form the words thank you.
